data.oai_dc:dc: Birds, Belize, Occurrence|Observation, Birds, Belize, Point Count

Point count data collected at the Maya Golden Landscape (Bladen Nature Reserve, Golden Stream Corridor Preserve and Columbia River Forest Reserve) by Ya'axche Conservation Trust. Data was collected from January 2010 to December 2016.|The dataset was developed based on point count data collected by Ya'axche Conservation Trust. The dataset includes observational data of both resident and migrant species. Having data on birds in Belize will allow information to be generated on diversity, abundance, etc.|6,342 occurrences
